About Orenburg State Medical University

Orenburg State Medical University is located in the city of Orenburg, Russia and was founded in 1944 by F.M. Lazarenko as Chkalov Medical Institute. This medical institute was reorganized into the Orenburg State Medical University in 1994. The university provides all modern technologies and meets all requirements for higher education. Graduates of this university occupy leading positions in public and private. More than 3,000 students and more than 500 academic professors in this University.

Orenburg Medical University is known for its high-quality medical education and world-class specialists. We provides hostel facilities and plenty of accommodation to Indian at affordable cost. We provide quality education and better accommodation for Students. The courses according to the guidelines of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation.

QUICK HIGHLIGHTS ABOUT ORENBURG STATE MEDICAL

Founded in 1944 Location Orenburg Oblast, Russia Recognition NMC & WHO certified Eligibility Aggregate 50% in Physics, Chemistry and Biology Course Duration Including internship 6 years course NEET Yes, Mandatory IELTS/TOFEL Not Necessary Medium of Teaching English & European

ELIGIBILTY FOR ADMISSION IN MBBS AND REQUIRED DOCUMENTS:-

ELIIBILTY CRITERIA

The candidate must having the Indian nationality.

The applicant must have clear the 12th standard with the subjects Physics, Chemistry, Biology and English.

The applicant must complete 17 years of age on or before 31st Dec of applying year.

The applicant must clear NEET exam.

REQUIRED DOCUMENTATION

10th and 12th passing mark sheets and transfer certificates

Bachelor’s passing mark sheet and transfer certificates

Copy of the international passport ( Should have minimum validity of 2 years) and any other ID proof.

8 passport size photograph.

Bank Balance certificate or Financial documents.

A return air ticket with the open return date of leaving during 1 year on arrival.

Meental and physical fitness certificated attested by ministry of foreign affairs.

Birth certificate on arrival

HOSTEL ACCOMODATION:-

Every rooms of the campus are integrated with a bed, pillow, mattress, blanket, desk with chair, water heaters and suitable lighting for both study and relaxation.

All hostel rooms are furnished and vary in size and with the wifi facility in most of the rooms.

Dormitory rooms can accommodate 2 or 3 students in each room.

There are common areas where students can mingle and can arrange sports and cultural and educational program.

Every room in the campus is assembled with kitchen for students to cook food to their own Choice. Students will only need to arrange their own utensils and cooking meals.

The administrative unit of the university is responsible for housekeeping, room cleaning and student’s security.

For foreigner students there is a mess facility provided by the campus according to their food.

Attached washrooms are provided in all the rooms

Why choose to Orenburg State Medical University ?

No entrance exam, donation required.

Easy admission process.

High standards of medical education.

Cost of MBBS in Russia is affordable.

The medium of education in Russia is English.

MBBS degree from Orenburg State Medical University is recognized by all major associations like ECFMG, WDOMS, FAIMER, NMC(MCI), etc. Indian scholars who complete their MBBS from Orenburg State Medical University can also work abroad in India Graduate Medical Examination.

Hostels with the best facilities.

More than 1,200 Indian students.

Students can choose between English and Russian at their discretion.
